title: Warning!
body:
IF you see "[REMOVED]" dodge, he raged all game 3/3 as kindred (not a feeder) however in the case of my last game i went 2/5 as illaoi, but according to this guy i singlehandedly lost us the game but paid no attention to the 4/22 bot lane and told me to kill myself in many vivid words, if RIOT could do something about him that'd be great

(yes i reported him)

replies.body:
Honestly don't care about name and shame

its for those who do see it to know, because riot apparently doesn't ban accoutns that are super toxic, but will chat ban me for say i fucked up lmao
Name a shaming isn't allowed on the boards. This will be down in the next hour or so just saying. Just report and leave it
